Question
========

Given is the following frequency table.

  ------- ----------- ------------- Sports car Family car Male 14 9 Female 8 15 ------- ----------- -------------

What is the expected cell frequency of a Man with Sports Car under the assumption of independence from the null hypothesis?

Answerlist
----------

* 11
* 11.5
* 14

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 11: Correct
* 11.5: Incorrect
* 14: Incorrect
